title: user: Current not implemented on linux/amd64
body:
Hello

I'm currently using Go 1.6 and crosscompiling [```caddy-hugo```](https://github.com/hacdias/caddy-hugo) on Travis using [```gox```](https://github.com/mitchellh/gox). When trying to execute the executable on Linux, I get the error ```user: Current not implemented on linux/amd64```. 

I tested the Windows executable and it works well.

What should I do?

Thanks,
